title: The New Age Baleno - Bold, Intelligent & Tech-Loaded - carandbike
content: The New Age Baleno - Bold, Intelligent & Tech-Loaded  carandbike
description: The new age Baleno is bold, intelligent, and loaded with best-in-class tech, in fact, it even offers the same level of performance, which impressed us in the first place. At a starting price of Rs. 6.35 lakh the Baleno offers a great value proposition.
